Fig. 8. Screen-paintings within the maravot enclosure (New Britain) 

Fig. 9. Natives who took part in the maravot. The central figure is a petty chief (Taipuk) who like 
 his two neighbours wore a collar of Cuscus-teeth. 

To facr 1111,1, 70s.
